verses.text: And when Rehoboam was come to Jerusalem , he gathered of the house of Judah and Benjamin an hundred and fourscore thousand chosen \add men\add*, which were warriors , to fight against Israel , that he might bring the kingdom again to Rehoboam.
But the word of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came to Shemaiah the man of God , saying ,
Speak unto Rehoboam the son of Solomon , king of Judah , and to all Israel in Judah and Benjamin , saying ,

Thus saith the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, Ye shall not go up , nor fight against your brethren : return every man to his house : for this thing is done of me. And they obeyed the words of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and returned from going against Jeroboam. \p
¶ And Rehoboam dwelt in Jerusalem , and built cities for defence in Judah.
He built even Beth-lehem , and Etam , and Tekoa ,
And Beth-zur , and Shoco , and Adullam ,
And Gath , and Mareshah , and Ziph ,
And Adoraim , and Lachish , and Azekah ,
And Zorah , and Aijalon , and Hebron , which \add are\add* in Judah and in Benjamin fenced cities.
And he fortified the strong holds , and put captains in them, and store of victual , and of oil and wine.
And in every several city \add he put\add* shields and spears , and made them exceeding strong , having Judah and Benjamin on his side. \p
¶ And the priests and the Levites that \add were\add* in all Israel resorted to him out of all their coasts.\f + \fr 11.13 \ft resorted…: Heb. presented themselves to him\f*

For the Levites left their suburbs and their possession , and came to Judah and Jerusalem : for Jeroboam and his sons had cast them off from executing the priest’s office unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*:
And he ordained him priests for the high places , and for the devils , and for the calves which he had made.

And after them out of all the tribes of Israel such as set their hearts to seek the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* God of Israel came to Jerusalem , to sacrifice unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* God of their fathers.
So they strengthened the kingdom of Judah , and made Rehoboam the son of Solomon strong , three years : for three years they walked in the way of David and Solomon. \p
¶ And Rehoboam took him Mahalath the daughter of Jerimoth the son of David to wife , \add and\add* Abihail the daughter of Eliab the son of Jesse ;
Which bare him children ; Jeush , and Shamariah , and Zaham.
And after her he took Maachah the daughter of Absalom ; which bare him Abijah , and Attai , and Ziza , and Shelomith.\f + \fr 11.20 \ft Maachah: she is also called Michaiah the daughter of Uriel\f*

And Rehoboam loved Maachah the daughter of Absalom above all his wives and his concubines : (for he took eighteen wives , and threescore concubines ; and begat twenty and eight sons , and threescore daughters.)
And Rehoboam made Abijah the son of Maachah the chief , \add to be\add* ruler among his brethren : for \add he thought\add* to make him king.

And he dealt wisely , and dispersed of all his children throughout all the countries of Judah and Benjamin , unto every fenced city : and he gave them victual in abundance. And he desired many wives.\f + \fr 11.23 \ft many wives: Heb. a multitude of wives\f*
